document_data.caption: A map showing the Flurmastyr residence on Anchoret's Court.
document_data.name: Flurmastyr Residence
document_data.mainbody: The '''Flurmastyr residence''' was a row house and the home of [[Kappiyan Flurmastyr]] located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The home stood two stories tall.
document_data.Location: The Flurmastyr residence was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]] on [[Anchoret's Court]] in between [[Anchoret's Alley]] and [[Caravan Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5296}}
